Trigger.name: (.+) unleashes a flurry of icy spikes at (.+), who is stabbed repeatedly\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) unleashes a flurry of icy spikes at (.+), who is stabbed repeatedly\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) unleashes a flurry of melting icy spikes at (.+), who is stabbed repeatedly\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) unleashes a flurry of melting icy spikes at (.+), who is stabbed repeatedly\.)

Trigger.name: (.+)'s icy spikes shred (.+), whose insides now flow freely to the ground\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+)'s icy spikes shred (.+), whose insides now flow freely to the ground\.)

Trigger.name: Spikes of solid ice form in your hands, which you launch at (.+)\.

regexCodeList.string: (Spikes of solid ice form in your hands, which you launch at (.+)\.)

Trigger.name: Spikes of ice form in your hands, but melt a bit as you launch them at (.+)\.

regexCodeList.string: (Spikes of ice form in your hands, but melt a bit as you launch them at (.+)\.)

Trigger.name: Your icy spikes shred (.+)'s guts, causing (.+) insides to flow outside\.

regexCodeList.string: (Your icy spikes shred (.+)'s guts, causing (.+) insides to flow outside\.)

Trigger.name: Your body is pierced by razor sharp ice spikes sent by (.+)!

regexCodeList.string: (Your body is pierced by razor sharp ice spikes sent by (.+)!)

Trigger.name: Your body is pierced by sharp but melting ice spikes sent by (.+)!

regexCodeList.string: (Your body is pierced by sharp but melting ice spikes sent by (.+)!)

Trigger.name: A flurry of icy spikes sent by (.+) is the last thing you ever see\.

regexCodeList.string: (A flurry of icy spikes sent by (.+) is the last thing you ever see\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) releases streaks of Fire at (.+), who screams in pain\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) releases streaks of Fire at (.+), who screams in pain\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) throws streaks of Fire at (.+), whose freshly charred corpse crumples to the ground\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) throws streaks of Fire at (.+), whose freshly charred corpse crumples to the ground\.)

Trigger.name: Streaks of fire flow from your hands, burning (.+)\.

regexCodeList.string: (Streaks of fire flow from your hands, burning (.+)\.)

Trigger.name: Streaks of Fire burn through (.+), leaving only a blackened corpse\.

regexCodeList.string: (Streaks of Fire burn through (.+), leaving only a blackened corpse\.)

Trigger.name: You gasp in pain as streaks of fire from (.+) burn your body!

regexCodeList.string: (You gasp in pain as streaks of fire from (.+) burn your body!)

Trigger.name: Your screams die away as streaks of Fire from (.+) devour your flesh\.

regexCodeList.string: (Your screams die away as streaks of Fire from (.+) devour your flesh\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) throws a fireball at (.+), who screams in pain\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) throws a fireball at (.+), who screams in pain\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) throws a weakened fireball at (.+), who screams in pain\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) throws a weakened fireball at (.+), who screams in pain\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) unleashes a fireball at (.+), whose charred corpse drops to the ground\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) unleashes a fireball at (.+), whose charred corpse drops to the ground\.)

Trigger.name: Fire coalesces into a ball at your hands, which you launch at (.+)\.

regexCodeList.string: (Fire coalesces into a ball at your hands, which you launch at (.+)\.)

Trigger.name: Fire coalesces in your hands, but fizzles a bit as you launch it at (.+)\.

regexCodeList.string: (Fire coalesces in your hands, but fizzles a bit as you launch it at (.+)\.)

Trigger.name: Your fireball blasts into (.+), dropping (.+) charred corpse to the ground\.

regexCodeList.string: (Your fireball blasts into (.+), dropping (.+) charred corpse to the ground\.)

Trigger.name: Your body is burned by a tremendous fireball sent by (.+)!

regexCodeList.string: (Your body is burned by a tremendous fireball sent by (.+)!)

Trigger.name: Your body is burned by a weakened fireball sent by (.+)!

regexCodeList.string: (Your body is burned by a weakened fireball sent by (.+)!)

Trigger.name: A flash of bright red fire sent by (.+) is the last thing you ever see\.

regexCodeList.string: (A flash of bright red fire sent by (.+) is the last thing you ever see\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) calls lightning from the sky, striking (.+) dead on\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) calls lightning from the sky, striking (.+) dead on\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) calls lightning from the sky to strike (.+), dropping (.+) sizzling corpse to the ground\.$

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) calls lightning from the sky to strike (.+), dropping (.+) sizzling corpse to the ground\.)

Trigger.name: You call lightning from the sky which strikes (.+)

regexCodeList.string: (You call lightning from the sky which strikes (.+) dead on\.)

Trigger.name: Your lightning from the sky strikes (.+), dropping (.+) sizzling corpse to the ground\.

regexCodeList.string: (Your lightning from the sky strikes (.+), dropping (.+) sizzling corpse to the ground\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) calls lightning from the sky to strike you, sizzling your insides!

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) calls lightning from the sky to strike you, sizzling your insides!)

Trigger.name: A bolt of lightning called from the sky by (.+) strikes you dead\.

regexCodeList.string: (A bolt of lightning called from the sky by (.+) strikes you dead\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) gestures and you begin to lose your balance\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) gestures and you begin to lose your balance\.)

Trigger.name: The vibrations are so incredible, (.+) is shaken into little pieces\.

regexCodeList.string: (The vibrations are so incredible, (.+) is shaken into little pieces\.)

Trigger.name: The earth trembles and shivers beneath your feet..!

regexCodeList.string: (The earth trembles and shivers beneath your feet\.\.!)

Trigger.name: You vibrate and are knocked about.

regexCodeList.string: (You vibrate and are knocked about\.)

Trigger.name: The vibrations are so incredible, you are shaken into little pieces.

regexCodeList.string: (The vibrations are so incredible, you are shaken into little pieces\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) stumbles from the impact of an unseen force\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) stumbles from the impact of an unseen force\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) is sent sprawling from the impact of an unseen force!

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) is sent sprawling from the impact of an unseen force!)

Trigger.name: (.+) cries from the impact of an unseen force, as (.+) corpse falls to the ground\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) cries from the impact of an unseen force, as (.+) corpse falls to the ground\.)

Trigger.name: You mold flows of Air into a tight stream, and smite (.+)\.

regexCodeList.string: (You mold flows of Air into a tight stream, and smite (.+)\.)

Trigger.name: You mold flows of air into a tight stream, sending (.+) sprawling!

regexCodeList.string: (You mold flows of air into a tight stream, sending (.+) sprawling!)

Trigger.name: You stumble beneath the crushing force of the air around you!

regexCodeList.string: (You stumble beneath the crushing force of the air around you!)

Trigger.name: The impact of an unseen force sends you sprawling!

regexCodeList.string: (The impact of an unseen force sends you sprawling!)

Trigger.name: An unseen force smashes the last bit of life from your battered body\.

regexCodeList.string: (An unseen force smashes the last bit of life from your battered body\.)

Trigger.name: You mold flows of Air into a massive blast that buffets (.+)!

regexCodeList.string: (You mold flows of Air into a massive blast that buffets (.+)!)

Trigger.name: A massive blast of air buffets you, knocking you off balance\.

regexCodeList.string: (A massive blast of air buffets you, knocking you off balance\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) is buffeted by a massive blast of air\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) is buffeted by a massive blast of air\.)

Trigger.name: The air around (.+)'s eyes seems to catch fire, blinding (.+).

regexCodeList.string: (The air around (.+)'s eyes seems to catch fire, blinding (.+)\.)

Trigger.name: (.+) has been blinded!

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) has been blinded!)

Trigger.name: The air around your eyes seems to catch fire, blinding you!

regexCodeList.string: (The air around your eyes seems to catch fire, blinding you!)

Trigger.name: You feel the flows of saidin|saidar coursing through your body.

regexCodeList.string: You feel the flows of saidar coursing through your body.
You feel the flows of saidin coursing through your body.

Trigger.name: You aren't in touch with saidin|saidar to channel it.

regexCodeList.string: You aren't in touch with saidar to channel it.
You aren't in touch with saidin to channel it.

Trigger.name: You lost control of Saidin|Saidar!

regexCodeList.string: You lost control of Saidar!
You lost control of Saidin!

Trigger.name: You can't summon enough energy to weave the flow.

regexCodeList.string: You can't summon enough energy to weave the flow.

Trigger.name: Ouch! You couldn't maintain the flows.

regexCodeList.string: Ouch! You couldn't maintain the flows.

Trigger.name: You fail to draw the necessary powers from the air here.

regexCodeList.string: You fail to draw the necessary powers from the air here.

Trigger.name: Impossible! You can't concentrate enough!

regexCodeList.string: Impossible! You can't concentrate enough!

Trigger.name: You begin to weave the appropriate flows...

regexCodeList.string: You begin to weave the appropriate flows...

Trigger.name: (.+) rocks back from the force of being hit with large chunks of hail\.

regexCodeList.string: ((.+) rocks back from the force of being hit with large chunks of hail\.)

Trigger.name: Bones snap loudly as large pieces of hail pummel (.+) to death\.$

regexCodeList.string: (Bones snap loudly as large pieces of hail pummel (.+) to death\.)

Trigger.name: A flash of bright white light appears, and suddenly envelopes you.

regexCodeList.string: A flash of bright white light appears, and suddenly envelopes you.

regexCodeList.string: (You sense (.+) is channeling saidar\.)

Trigger.name: You sense (.+) connecting to the True Source\.

Trigger.name: Your white aura has faded.

regexCodeList.string: Your white aura has faded.

Trigger.name: You channel flows of Spirit, and refresh those around you.

Trigger.name: Foxhead Disruption

regexCodeList.string: Your flows are disrupted by some unseen force.
